mapper.update: update examPaper set examId = #{examId},studentId = #{studentId} where id = #{id}
update examPaper set status = #{status},score = #{score},startExamTime = #{startExamTime},endExamTime = #{endExamTime},useTime = #{useTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from examPaper where examId = #{examId} and studentId = #{studentId}

select ep.finalScore as finalScore,ep.score as score,ep.subScoreTotal as subScoreTotal,ep.totalScore as totalScore,s.trueName as sname,sub.name as subject,e.passScore as passScore,ep.cheat as cheat from examPaper ep,student s,subject sub,exam e where ep.examId = #{value} and ep.studentId = s.id and ep.examId = e.id and sub.id = s.subjectId and finalScore!="" order by finalScore desc

select e.name as ename, s.trueName as sname, e.totalScore as totalScore, e.passScore as passScore, ep.score as score, ep.subScoreTotal as subScore, ep.finalScore as finalScore from exam e, student s, exampaper ep where e.id = #{examId} and s.trueName = #{sname} and ep.examId = e.id and ep.studentId = s.id

select count(*) as candidates,e.examedNum as examedNum,e.passNum as passNum, e.singleQuestionNum as singleQuestionNum, e.muiltQuestionNum as muiltQuestionNum, e.chargeQuestionNum as chargeQuestionNum, e.fillQuestionNum as fillQuestionNum, e.shortQuestionNum as shortQuestionNum from student s, exam e where e.id = #{value} and s.subjectId =(select e.subjectId from exam e where e.id = #{value})
mapper.update: update examPaper set subScoreTotal = #{subScoreTotal} where id = #{id}
update examPaper set finalScore = #{finalScore} where id = #{id}
